name: .BFX File Extension
summary: Learn about .BFX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Fax created by Bitware, a once-popular digital fax program sold by Cheyenne; contains a digital fax that can be sent via a modem; can be converted into .PDF or .JPEG files using various programs.

content: Bitware was commonly bundled with computer modem purchases. It is no longer supported.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
